title.en: A Friend of Jesus the Messiah Dies

en: A close friend of Jesus became seriously ill.
The sisters sent an urgent message.
But Jesus did not come immediately.

label.en: The One You Love Is Sick

lines: Now a man named Lazarus was sick.
the village of Mary and her sister Martha.
So the sisters sent word to Jesus,
“Lord, the one you love is sick.”
When Jesus heard this, he said,
“This sickness will not end in death.
No, it is for God’s glory
so that God’s Son may be glorified through it.”
Jesus loved Martha and her sister and Lazarus.
Yet he stayed where he was two more days.
Then Jesus told his disciples plainly,
and for your sake I am glad I was not there,
But let us go to him.”

question.en: Why do you think Jesus delayed, even though he loved Lazarus? What might he mean by saying this was for God’s glory?
